name: Knights Of Dice
description:
DISCLAMER:
If you're looking for stunning visual effects, I'm afraid that you will have to look elsewhere..
However:
If you're looking for some interesting dice-chucking fun, please read on:

Knights of Dice is a dice-rolling game, which aims to please gamers that are into boardgames, turnbased games, and strategy with a sprinkle of action.

Featuring:
- Dice rolling fun where you build attributes - will you use the powerful 6 and risk discarding the rest of your dice? Or will you play it safe, and use a poor dice.
- Strategic building of attributes which are used in another part of the game.
- Chain bonusses for maximum effect.
- Upgrades, potions, enemies, special-blocks and much more...
